name: part_001
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】重大告知あり！＂アニソン Night Fever!!＂【#角巻わため生誕祭2025】 [rhgRzAgYKDM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'only my railgun' by fripSide.
Transition between songs; Watame picks up a guitar.
Performance of the song 'Guitars, Loneliness and Blue Planet' by Kessoku Band.
scenes.song_name: ギターと孤独と蒼い惑星 (Guitars, Loneliness and Blue Planet)

subtitles.original: その先に遥かな想いを
subtitles.english: With far-off feelings ahead

subtitles.original: 歩いてきたこの道を振り返ることしか
subtitles.english: If the only thing I can do is look back on the path I've walked...

subtitles.original: 出来ないなら今ここで全てを壊せる
subtitles.english: then I'll break everything right here and now.

subtitles.original: 暗闇に堕ちる街並み 人はどこまで立ち向かえるの？
subtitles.english: Fallen cityscapes in the darkness; just how far can people stand against it?

subtitles.original: 加速するその痛みから誰かをきっと守れるよ
subtitles.english: I'm sure I can protect someone from this accelerating pain.

subtitles.original: Looking! The blitz loop this planet to search my Only my railgun can shoot it.
subtitles.english: Looking! The blitz loop this planet to search my Only my railgun can shoot it.

subtitles.original: 今すぐ身体中を光の速さで駆け巡った確かな予感
subtitles.english: Right now, a definite premonition raced through my body at the speed of light.

subtitles.original: 掴め！望むものなら残さず輝ける自分らしさで
subtitles.english: Seize it! If it's what you desire, you can shine by being yourself without leaving anything behind.

subtitles.original: 信じてるよあの日の誓いをこの瞳に光る涙
subtitles.english: I believe in that day's vow, and the tears shining in these eyes...

subtitles.original: それさえも強さになるから
subtitles.english: even they will become my strength.

subtitles.original: 立ち止まると少しだけ感じる切なさに
subtitles.english: In the faint sadness I feel when I come to a halt...

subtitles.original: 戸惑うことないなんて嘘はつかないよ
subtitles.english: I won't lie and say I'm never bewildered.

subtitles.original: 宙に舞うコインが描く放物線が決める運命
subtitles.english: The parabola drawn by a coin dancing in the air determines destiny.

subtitles.original: 打ち出した答えが今日も私の胸を駆け巡る
subtitles.english: The answer I struck out races through my heart again today.

subtitles.original: Sparkling! The shiny lights awake true desire. Only my railgun can shoot it.
subtitles.english: Sparkling! The shiny lights awake true desire. Only my railgun can shoot it.

subtitles.original: 必ず貫いてく途惑うことなく傷ついても走り続ける
subtitles.english: I'll always pierce through, without hesitation, continuing to run even if I get hurt.

subtitles.original: 狙え！凛と煌めく視線は狂いなく闇を切り裂く
subtitles.english: Aim! My dignified, sparkling gaze will slice through the darkness without error.

subtitles.original: 迷いなんて吹き飛ばせばいいこの心が叫ぶ限り
subtitles.english: I should just blow away any hesitation as long as my heart screams out.

subtitles.original: 誰ひとり邪魔などさせない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone get in my way.

subtitles.original: 儚く舞う無数の願いはこの両手に積もってゆく
subtitles.english: The countlessly dancing, fleeting wishes pile up in both my hands.

subtitles.original: 切り裂く闇に見えてくるのは重く深く切ない記憶
subtitles.english: What I see through the cut-open darkness are heavy, deep, and painful memories.

subtitles.original: 色褪せてゆく現実に揺れる絶望には負けたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to lose to the despair swaying in the fading reality.

subtitles.original: 私が今私であること胸を張って全て誇れる
subtitles.english: That I am who I am right now—I can take pride in all of it.

subtitles.original: Looking! The blitz loop this planet to search my Only my railgun can shoot it.
subtitles.english: Looking! The blitz loop this planet to search my Only my railgun can shoot it.

subtitles.original: 今すぐ身体中を光の速さで駆け巡った確かな予感
subtitles.english: Right now, a definite premonition raced through my body at the speed of light.

subtitles.original: 放て！心に刻んだ夢を未来さえ置き去りにして
subtitles.english: Release it! Leave the future itself behind with the dream carved into your heart.

subtitles.original: 限界など知らない意味ないこの能力(ちから)が光散らす
subtitles.english: Boundaries are unknown and meaningless; this power scatters light.

subtitles.original: その先に遥かな想いを
subtitles.english: With far-off feelings ahead

subtitles.original: ギターと孤独と蒼い惑星
subtitles.english: Guitars, Loneliness and Blue Planet

subtitles.original: 突然降る夕立 ああ傘もないや嫌
subtitles.english: A sudden evening shower, ah, I don't even have an umbrella, how annoying.

subtitles.original: 空のご機嫌なんかしらない
subtitles.english: I don't care about the sky's mood.

subtitles.original: 季節の変わり目の服は何着りゃいいんだろ
subtitles.english: What should I wear during the change of seasons?

subtitles.original: 春と秋 どこいっちゃったんだよ
subtitles.english: Spring and autumn, where did they go?

subtitles.original: 息もできない情報の圧力
subtitles.english: The pressure of information that leaves me unable to breathe.

subtitles.original: めまいの螺旋 私はどこにいる
subtitles.english: A spiral of dizziness, where am I?

subtitles.original: こんなに こんなに 息の音がするのに
subtitles.english: Despite my breath sounding like this, so much...

subtitles.original: 変だね 世界の音がしない
subtitles.english: It's strange, I can't hear the sounds of the world.
